name: J Scott Weisman Law Offices Reviews

review.title: “Excellent work environment, exceptional commitment to the clients.”
review.pros: Pros – There is a clear strive for excellence and the clients needs always come first. Due to that approach performance is rewarded both financially and with personal accomplishment that gets recognized.
review.cons: Cons – None of any relevance. A lot of hours are expected in order to meet clients' needs but that in itself comes with a certain satisfaction.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep up the commitment to the clients.
